post.author: 허현옥
post.content:
MySchool off line meeting
- Welcome anybody who is interested in this project

You don't have to bring anything except the passion of software developmemt.


Hi. all.

As you all know, our off-line meeting will hold at 한방병원, 7pm on
Thursday(2006/Jan/12).

Mr.Boo, If you can please bring "projector", then we all can see Storyboard together.

To whom may use TTC: go to Finch subway station then follow "Bus" sign at the subway station but don't take the bus! and walk toward Yonge st. North side. after you pass "Tim hortons" you will see the shopping mall , There will be 한방병원 at first right side corner of the mall.

See you guys then.
post.title: MySchool off line meeting - Welcome anybody who is interested in this project
